instructions: Add ingredients to blender twister jar.  Blend medium to medium high speed for 40 seconds

ingredients: Tuna or Chicken (canned or sous vide)
instructions: Combine and mix tuna, mayo, salsa in bowl
Put mixture onto half of tortilla.  Put cheese on top of tuna
Fold in half, melt on press/grill
Finely chop lettuce.  Add to bowl and mix with salad dressing
Place cheese on flatbread.  Place turkey on cheese.  Place lettuce on turkey
Fold in half and grill/press

ingredients: Ground Pork (or beef); Lazy version, roast beef
instructions: Cook ground pork/beef; or slice and add roast beef to fry up
Add other ingredients
Add to lettuce wraps
Whisk soy sauce, cornstarch, oyster sauce and cooking wine to make a sauce
Marinade meat in soy sauce and sesame oil
Add water to wok, add broccoli and salt.  Slightly steam broccoli until water is gone
Clear Wok, add oil and beef for color.  Remove beef
Add oil, scallions, ginger and garlic, cook
Add back in broccoli, heat for a bit, add back in beef.  Add sauce, as it heats it will thicken.
Add sesame seeds

ingredients: boneless chicken thighs, bite sized pieces
instructions: Beat egg, add soy sauce, cornstarch, wine, baking powder.  Mix together.
Add chicken thighs.  Marinade for a few hours
In a clean bowl, add baking powder and cornstarch
In another bowl, mix soy sauce, wine, rice vinegar, sugar, cornstarch, chili flakes
Drege chicken through powder bowl and deep fry it 350-370 degrees
In a wok, heat oil and fry scallions, ginger and garlic
Add sauce, let thicken, add chicken, coat with sauce
Add sesame seeds, serve over rice

name: Gumbo
notes: It shares many ingredients with Chicken a la King, so maybe buy ingredients for both at once
Alternate recipe: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=anKpOdElcZ4

ingredients: oil (grapeseed or vegetable oil for higher smoke point)
6 large cloves of garlic or garlic powder
garlic powder, onion powder, w sauce
instructions: Season chicken with salt, pepper and oil.  Broil until golden.
Dice onion, green bell pepper, and celery.  Mince jalapeno.  Can use food processor.  Mince garlic
Make a roux.  Melt butter and add oil, add flour.  Keep whisking and cook until dark.  Go low and slow.  Takes about 30 minutes.
Add vegetables, cook them down.
Add 1 cup of beer, cook off alcohol
Add 1 quart stock.
If oil is coming to the surface, you can skim it off here
Add seasonings: salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, w sauce, creole seasoning, 5 bay leaves, thyme, cayenne pepper for optional heat
Let it simmer for 3 hours, stir every 30 minutes.  Skim off fat during simmer.
After done with simmer, add meats: chicken, sausage, shrimp
Serve over rice w/ green onions

name: Chicken A La King
notes: It shares many ingredients with Gumbo, so maybe buy ingredients for both at once

versions.name: prepare chicken
instructions: Cook chicken, let it cool, cut into pieces, save for recipe

versions.name: prepare vegetables
instructions: Dice vegetables, peppers, fennel

versions.name: make
instructions: Put vegetables in pan, cook then down
Dust with some flour, cook out rawness from the flour
Deglaze with stock and sherry, cook off alcohol
Add heavy cream, egg yolk to thicken
Serve over toast

ingredients: garlic: 3 cloves minced for sauce, 3 cloves minced for kale
instructions: Preheat oven to 450F
In small saucepan, add 3/4 cup ketchup, 2 Tbsp honey, 2 Tbsp soy sauce, 3 Tbsp Worchestshire sauce.  Mix and simmer for 2-5 minutes to reduce to glaze.
In a bowl, combine 1 pound ground chicken, 3 cloves garlic, 2 sliced green onions, 1 beaten egg.  Season with salt and pepper and mix with hands.
Form into about 12 balls.  Place onto parchment paper.  Put into oven 15 minutes or until done.
Heat oil in very hot pan, place in kale to get slight char on both sides.
Add 3 cloves garlic and salt to kale.  Add lemon/lime juice.  Stir and place into bowl.
After 15 minutes, remove meatballs from oven, brush with sauce glaze.  Put back into oven under broiler for a couple minutes
Serve meatballs over yogurt on plate as garnish with kale
Place 1 cup of basmati rice into a small sauce pan.  Wash and drain the rice a couple of times to get rid of the excess starch
Toast the rice for a couple of minutes on medium high heat.  Then, add in 1 cup of coconut milk
When the milk starts to bubble, give the rice a good stir to make sure nothing is grabbing the bottom of the pan.  Then, cover and cook on medium low for 15min
Dice the red onion, coarsely chop the peanuts, and chop the broccolini
After 15min, turn the heat off and let the rice steam further for 10min
Heat up a non stick pan on medium heat.  Add the coconut oil
Add the red onion and chickpeas followed by the garlic powder, chili powder, smoked paprika, turmeric, and salt
Add in the hazelnuts and broccolini
Sauté for 3-4min
Add the shredded coconut.  Sauté for another couple of minutes and taste and adjust the seasoning if needed
Plate the rice and add the coconut chickpeas on top.  Garnish with some freshly chopped cilantro

name: Breakfast Casserole

ingredients: 3/4 pound uncooked sausage, casings removed (You can use ground turkey, ground beef or ground chicken instead)
optional: 1 teaspoon dried rosemary to give the sausage more flavor
2 bell peppers, diced (any color you prefer; about 2 cups)
4 slices day-old bread (gluten free, whole wheat, white, sourdough, any kind you like)
1/2 cup milk (I use almond milk, any milk works) (Mom used a can of coconut milk)
1/2 cup shredded cheese - any works - pepper jack, mozzarella, gouda, swiss, cheddar
instructions: Set a large skillet over medium heat and coat it with nonstick spray or a drizzle of olive oil. Place sausage in the skillet and begin to break it up with a spatula or fork. Stir in the rosemary and brown the sausage, about 6-7 minutes.

Meanwhile, set a 2nd skillet over medium heat and coat it with nonstick spray or a drizzle of olive oil. (If you have a skillet large enough to fit both the sausage and veggies, you can just add the veggies to the sausage that is browning in step 1.) Add the peppers, mushrooms, spinach, onion, garlic, and a sprinkle each of salt and pepper. Begin stirring and cooking the veggies down until tender, about 6-8 minutes.
Set sausage and veggies aside.
Generously grease a 9×13 baking pan. Break the bread into pieces and place in the pan in an even layer.

In a large bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, and 1/4 cup shredded cheese together. Pour half of this egg mixture over the bread. Top with the sausage and vegetables, then the remaining egg mixture and remaining 1/4 cup cheese. Add a sprinkle of salt and pepper on top.
Cover casserole with plastic wrap or aluminum foil and refrigerate for 2 hours or overnight– or up to 1 day. Allow it to come to room temperature before baking.

Preheat the oven to 375°F (191°C). Bake the casserole, uncovered, until the top is golden, edges are crisp, and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean– about 40-45 minutes. I like mine on the super crisp side, so I bake it for around 45-50 minutes. Allow to cool for 10 minutes, then slice and serve. Tastes awesome with hot sauce on top.
Leftovers keep well in the refrigerator for up to 5 days. Reheat in the microwave to your liking.

notes: Mom made this for Owen's baptism.  It was great!

name: Leftover Chicken or Turkey Wraps
notes: Great for leftover chicken or turkey

name: Thick Hot Chocolate
notes: I didn't measure the milk, probably added closer to two cups, and it was still too thick.  1 Tbsp cornstarch was too much.  It was also very sweet (used 72% chocolate).  Probably reduce sugar from 2 Tbsp.
Reduced corstarch and sugar, was better.  maybe reduced cornstarch and sugar too much.  2tsp cornstarch and 4tsp sugar?
Tried with almond milk and no chocolate bar, total failure

instructions: Add dark chocolate, sugar, cocoa powder and splash of milk to a small saucepan on medium heat.  Stir until melted.
Add in a cup of milk.
In a separate bowl, mix cornstarch and splash of milk to make a slurry.  Add slurry to melted chocolate slowly while stirring.  Stir and heat until thickened.

name: Faux Wendy's Spicy Chicken Sandwich
notes: This is great, but deep frying is kind of a pain.  Maybe half deep fry?  Added pickeled jalapenos because we had them and they were awesome

ingredients: flour, cayenne, paprika, garlic powder, black pepper, salt, vegetable oil
instructions: Pound Chicken breasts flat
In a bowl, whisk an egg and hot sauce.
In a second bowl, add flour and cayenne, paprika, garlic powder, black pepper and salt.
Dredge chicken through dry bowl, then wet bowl, then dry again. Freeze chicken if possible.
In a small skillet, heat vegetable oil on medium.  Use enough vegetable oil to almost submerge breasts.  Fry for 3-4 minutes per side.  After pulling out, add salt to fried chicken
Serve on toasted buns with mayo, lettuce and tomato

ingredients: 2 pounds boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts
1 cup coconut milk or 3 Tbsp greek yogurt
instructions: saute onion, spices, transfer to slow cooker
Add allexpect coconut milk and/or yogurt to slow cooker
cook for 6 hours on low
Remove chicken and shred, re-add to slow cooker with coconut milk
Finish cooking uncovered to thicken, taste for additional salt

name: Caramelized Onion Jam
notes: Great for leftover extra onions

instructions: Heat vegetable oil and sugar, stirring constantly until sugar is light brown, about 10 minutes.  Mixture will be very hot.
Add diced onions.  Stir constantly for about 15 minutes.
Pour red wine vinegar and let simmer until consistency is jam like, about 30 minutes

name: Onion Pasta
notes: Great for leftover extra onions

ingredients: 1 pound uncooked pasta, cooked according to package directions
instructions: Cook pasta
Cook onions in a separate bowl
Add basic, black pepper, water and bouillon.  Simmer 10 minutes
Combine pasta and onion mixture.  Sprinkle with cheese.

versions.name: Overnight in the slow cooker, caramelize the onions
instructions: Slice onions, add everything to pot and cook overnight on low.
If you're around, you can take off the lid to release steam to aid carmelization.  Just set a reminder to check and stir if you do this

versions.name: The next day in the slow cooker
ingredients: 1/2 cup alcohol (dry sherry, red wine or dark beer)
instructions: Add ingredients to slow cooker, let it cook on low until lunch or dinner

versions.name: Serving
instructions: Serve with shredded cheese on top.  Toast is a good side dish

name: Chicken Fried Rice
notes: Good for day-old rice

versions.name: Rice
ingredients: ~2 cups cooked rice is required before starting the rest

versions.name: Stir Fry Veggies
instructions: cut chicken breast into small pieces
Marinate chicken with corn starch, soy sauce, vegetable oil and baking soda.  Set aside for 30 minutes
Chop garlic and vegetables
beat two eggs in a bowl
heat up wok, add 1 teaspoon vegetable oil, wait for smoke
add egg, wait for fluffy then mix and break up, remove egg
Add more oil, add chicken pieces for a couple of minutes
push chicken to side, add garlic then vegetables to center of wok
Give vegetables some time in the midle, then mix it all together, add salt

versions.name: Cooking the Rice
ingredients: 3 Tablespoons soy sauce (1 light 2 dark if you have it)
instructions: Remove everything from wok, add more oil, add cooked rice, break down big pieces and stir, fry for 3-5 minutes
Add soy sauce and mix fast
Add vegetables, meat, and egg, and mix
Add salt and pepper
Add spring onions just before eating

ingredients: 8oz mozarella cubed or grated (full fat preferred)
instructions: Break lasagna into bite-sized pieces
In large high side pan, add de-cased sausage, break up and mash to add color
Remove sausage from pan and add onion, garlic and red pepper flakes.  Toast for about a minute
Add tomatoes, add sausage back in
Add a half cup of water and lasagna sheets and try to mix back in, top with tomato sauce
Cover and reduce heat to medium low.  cook for 20 minutes and stir occassionally
Add parmesan cheese and mozarella cheese and mix
add ricotta cheese to the top and cover to warm and melt cheese
Heat the olive oil in a stockpot over medium heat.
While the oil is heating up, mince the garlic then add to the pot.
Cook the garlic for approximately 2 minutes until toasted.
Add the lentils along with the chicken broth, water, curry powder, black pepper, and salt, then stir to combine.
Crank up the heat and bring to a simmer, then turn the heat down to low.
Cook for 20 minutes or until the lentils reach desired doneness (we prefer them slightly grainy).
Add the heavy cream, stir, and allow to cool slightly.
Garnish with olive oil, pepper, and green onions if you have them.
Optional: Drain the chickpeas.  I don't do this normally
Put into blender and blend, taste and add salt
(Optional) Top with paprika and olive oil
Mix all ingredients other than sour cream in a pan
Combine sour cream, lime juice and water to make a smooth creamy topping
Preheat oven to 250F
Wash and dry the kale completely dry.  Remove stems
Add 1-2 tsp olive oil and sea salt.  Too much oil prevents kale from crisping.
Cook in oven.  Will take about 15 minutes.  Keep an eye on them to make sure they don't burn.

ingredients: Chicken Thighs, cut into bite sized pieces
sugar, vinegar, cornstarch, baking powder, egg

versions.name: Chicken Thighs
instructions: Make a batter with corn starch (about 1 cup), baking powder (1/2 tsp), salt, add water and whisk in egg to make batter-like consistency.
Coat chicken in batter and semi-deep fry in about 1 inch of oil

versions.name: Finishing
instructions: Drain pineapple juice from can into saucepan, add sugar, vinegar, salt, red food coloring.  Separately combine cornstarch (2Tbsp) and water into slurry, add to sauce to thicken.  Heat sauce to simmer.
Add sauce, green pepper and pineapple to wok.  Don't cook too long, keep vegetables and chicken crispy
Serve with rice

ingredients: Macaroni Noodles, 2 cups, dry whole wheat preferred
ground beef or ground soy, 1/2 pound or 1 1/2 cups
fresh spinach, 1/2 bag to a bag

instructions: Cook macaroni but leave al dente, drain.
In a large pot, saute onions, add garlic, deglaze with water
Add diced tomatoes, rinse out can with water and add to the pot.  Add tomato paste, bouillon cube and spice, bring to a boil.
Add protein, carrots, bell pepper and kidney beans, cook until carrots are soft (~5 minutes)
Add drained macaroni and spinach.  Serve with garnish.

ingredients: Extra vegetables: zuccini, cauliflower, brocolli, tomatoes, peppers
instructions: Saute onions until they're golden, deglaze as need
Add garlic, ginger and chili, saute for a few more minutes then drop heat to medium
Add spices, mix well
Add 2 cups boiling water, boullion cube and lentils, simmer for 25 minutes, stirring occassionally
Dice extra vegetables, add to pot with coconut milk, mix, cook for another 10 minutes with pot uncovered
Serve with rice

ingredients: cheese, grueyere preferred for potatoes, parmesan for top
instructions: Peel potatoes, dice into large chunks, boil until piercable then drain and mash.
Add butter (8 Tbsp) and milk (1/2 cup) to saucepan, heat until butter melted, add to mashed potatoes.  Grate in cheese.  Season with salt and pepper
Add ground beef to dutch oven and brown.  Mash it up w/ potato masher, season w/ salt and pepper.  Dump out ground beef.
Add 1 Tbsp butter to empty dutch oven.  Melt the butter and add diced mushrooms, let them brown.
Add onion, celery, carrot and garlic.  Season with salt and pepper.  Let soften for a few minutes.  Not too long or pie will be too mushy
Add tomato paste, saute for a couple of minutes, deglaze with red wine, add worchestershire sauce, bring to a boil
Preheat oven to 375F
Add thyme and rosemary, reduce until liquid is gone.  Add beef stock and frozen peas.  Once peas are added, ready for caserole dish

Add mixture to casterole dish, pack it in tight and spread it out, add mashed potatoes, spread them on top.  Grate plenty of cheese on top.  Pop into preheated oven for 20 minutes or until top is brown.
Let sit for 20 minutes
Add 2 cups ricotta cheese to food processor.  Process until smooth
Add 3 Tbsp sugar. Pinch of salt
Melt 4oz semi sweet chocolate chips. Add to food processor

ingredients: Flour, bread or regular (almond flour won't work)
instructions: Barely melt butter into big pyrex jug (~30 seconds)
Add sugar, whish with fork
Add egg and a splash of vanilla, 1 teaspoon of salt, 1 Tablespoon of baking powder, whisk together
Add liquid to fill to 2 cup line
Add flour, about 1 cup and a half, until consistency like pancakes, fold with liquid
In a pan over medium heat, heat oil. Add onions and garlic and cook until limp.
Add ground beef and cook, breaking to pieces with the back of a spoon, until lightly browned. Drain excess fat, if any.
Add fish sauce and cook for about 1 to 2 minutes.
Add tomato sauce and crushed tomatoes.
Add water and bring to a boil. Lower heat, cover and cook for about 10 to 15 minutes or until beef is cooked through.
Add potatoes, carrots, peas, raisins. Cover and continue to simmer for about 3 to 5 minutes or until tender.
Continue to cook until sauce is reduced and thickened. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

name: Butter Chicken
notes: It was okay but tasted a little heavy.  Maybe more tomatoes and onions.  Keep looking

instructions: Heat a cast iron skillet
toast your buns
Carmelize onions with salt.  To speed up process, you can add some sugar
Remove onions and get the skillet hot, add burgers and smush them down
Season with salt and pepper
Flip, season again, cook a bit, then add cheese to melt

versions.name: Sausage
ingredients: breakfast sausage or chorizo or ground turkey/beef or bacon
instructions: Break down sausage and fry.  Remove from pan.
Dice potatoes into small cubes and fry until golden, remove from pan
Scramble eggs, remove from pan
Dice and Saute veggies

versions.name: Sausage
instructions: Break down sausage and fry.  Remove from pan.
Dice potatoes into small cubes and fry until golden, remove from pan
Scramble eggs, remove from pan
Dice and Saute veggies
Cook meat and onions
Combine all in stand mixer
Add to tortillas, add to baking dish, 350F for 40min
throw ingredients into crock pot / instant pot

name: Crockpot Barbacoa
notes: Meat was dry after cooking eight hours.  Don't let it go too long

ingredients: Chuck Roast (~2.5 pounds), cut into chunks
4 peppers and 2 Tbsp sauce from can chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, (chop them up manually)
instructions: throw all into crock pot
cook on low 4 hours

ingredients: 1 pack American cheese or melting cheese
instructions: Add bacon to pan
saute vegetables
Add flour to absorb excess fat, less greasy, cook flour
deglaze chicken stock, not too much
season with chili powder
Add salsa, cook it down
Add milk
Add cheese, melt it down
Add hot sauce if wanted

name: Meatza Pizza Crust
notes: This was a banger!

instructions: Mix it all together with a mixer
spread onto parchment paper
Bake at 450F for about 20 minutes
Add toppings, broil for two minutes

versions.name: Chicken
ingredients: chicken thighs (Full pack and/or frozen is fine)
instructions: chicken, salt, pepper and garlic powder into slow cooker on low all day

versions.name: Consomme
instructions: toast the chilles, add the rest of the ingredients, let soften
blend, strain back into liquid
wash and half three limes, add to blender with water
puree and strain out liquid
Add liquid, sweetened condensed milk and ice to blender
blend and enjoy
Mix all ingredients in a large bowl other than bread
Cut bread into bite sized pieces, put into bowl and soal up all liquid
Fry the toast
mix and mash all ingrediants
put on parchment paper, smoosh cookies flat
bake at 350 for 20 minutes
Air fry chicken breasts at 390 for 20 minutes, remove and shread with forks
In a pan, mix a half stick of butter, some honey and enough bbq sauce for the chicken, mix with shredded chicken in a bowl
Put back in the air fryer at 390 for 7 minutes

versions.name: Main Dish
instructions: mix and heat either stovetop or microwave

versions.name: (Optional) Toppings
instructions: Toast almonds, oats and some diced apples
Top bowls with toasted mix and honey or maple sytrup

versions.name: Marinade chicken
instructions: Mix dry ingredients.  Use 1/2 in marinade and save the other half
Mix and marinate until you loose patience

versions.name: Sauce
ingredients: (optional) dried flakes like parsley or oregano
instructions: mix

versions.name: Chicken and rice
instructions: Fry chicken in some oil, remove chicken when cooked
Add rest of seasoning mix, add some more oil, add rice, toast for a bit
Add water or stock, bring to a boil, cover and simmer

versions.name: Serve
instructions: Dice lettuce and tomatoes
Serve chicken, rice, lettuce, tomatoes and sauce

versions.name: marinade chicken
instructions: Add chicken to a ziploc bag.  Add garlic, paprika, cumin, salt, pepper, lime juice, olive oil.  Massage ingredients into the chicken.  Put into the fridge for a while

versions.name: Cilantro Lime Crema Sauce
ingredients: half a cup of greek yogurt (~1 prepackaged cup)
instructions: Add cilantro, jalapeno, garlic, yogurt, honey, salt, olive oil to a blender, twister jar is recommended
optionally add mayo and/or sour cream to make creamier
blend, add liquid if blender can't start

versions.name: Air fry
instructions: Fry up the chicken at 370 for 18-25 minutes depending on chicken size (less for boneless, more for bone-in)

name: Cheat Lemon Pie
notes: Makes two pies, make sure you have enough room in your freezer

ingredients: 2x Pre-made graham cracker crust (or any crust)
instructions: Combine ingredients into bowl, mix until combined
Pour into pie crusts and freeze

versions.name: Dry Ingrediets
ingredients: 45g (90g) sugar substitute (Erythritol or monk fruit or other)

instructions: Add wet and dry ingredients to separate bowls
Mix wet and try together
Pour half of mixture into a separate bowl
In one bowl, add the following:
12g (24) cocoa powder
cinnamon
cayenne
2 (4) packets sweetener (Stevia, Splenda, etc)
Alternate pouring the mixtures into 1 (2) loaf pans
Optionally, cut and swirl with a knife in the loaf pan
Bake at 275 for 45 minutes

versions.name: Spice Marinade
ingredients: liquid smoke (optional, or use real smoke, see below)
instructions: Mix dry ingredients
Add olive oil, lemon juice and tomato paste
optionally, add lemon zest

versions.name: Chicken Prep
instructions: Slice thighs into little strips
Marinade overnight

versions.name: Toum sauce
ingredients: 1 cup neutral oil (corn, canola, vegetable, avocado, grapeseed, sunflower, peanut)
instructions: Blend all ingredients together

versions.name: Make fries (optional)
instructions: Make some frensh friend in the air frier.  Goes well in/with Shawarma

versions.name: Cooking the chicken
instructions: Slice some dill pickles if you don't have dill relish
Sear the chicken on high heat.  Don't crowd the pan.  Allow a crust to develop

versions.name: Final Assembly
instructions: Add pita to pan to soak leftover chicken fat, spread toum sauce on pita in pan, add chicken and sliced dill pickles
Add fries (optional)
Add pomegranite molassses (optional)
Wrap pita in parchment paper
Wrap pita in aluminum foil, heat in pan, slice diagonally
Serve with Toum

name: Baked Chicken Thighs
notes: Family loved it!

versions.name: Marinade
instructions: Marinade chicken thighs overnight or longer
Add to baking pan and bake at 400 for 35 minutes
Put under broiler for 5 minutes

name: Cottage Cheese Pancakes
notes: I deviated from the recipe and added more flour.  I am reducing the number of eggs here too because it was a bit too eggy

instructions: Blend all ingredients together

ingredients: beef flavoring (2 Tbsp Beef Better than Bouillon preferred, 2 cans beef broth or cubes OK)
Mushrooms (cremini, aka baby bella preferred, white button OK)
3 Tbsp Dutch Process cocoa powder (regular OK)
instructions: Trim excess fat from roast, salt and leave out
Slice onion
clean and slice mushrooms
mince the garlic
dry and sear beef in instant pot or pan
Add 2 Tbsp Better than Bouillon to two cups of water, or cubes
Add cocoa powder to liquid
If water used, add salt
Remove meat from pot, add sliced onions with salt, brown just a bit
Add sliced mushrooms to pot, mix, cook a bit
Add minced garlic to pot, mix, cook a bit
Add meat back in the top of pot, add broth
If meat not covered, add water to cover meat
Add a lot of black pepper to pot
Cover and cook for eight hours on low.  Don't use as pressure cooker

versions.name: Side Suggestions
instructions: Half the brussel sprouts, Add to a bowl with oil, salt, pepper and cayenne to toss. Bake on a sheet pan at 450 for 20 minutes
Slice and saute the carrots in butter and brown swerve

versions.name: Final Prep
instructions: Remove the beef from the slow cooker
Add most liquid / onion mix to blender, add xanthan gum to make a gravy.  Butter optionally too
Plate and serve beef, gravy, brussel sprouts and carrots

name: Mac and Cheese and peas
notes: Fantastic recipe, really creamy.  Lunch with no leftovers.  Suggest more salt and add vegetables

instructions: Microwave frozen vegetables, drain water
Bring four cups of water to a rolling boil, add salt
add and stir half a pound macaroni
boil for 12 minutes then stop
shred two cups of cheddar
strain the paste, save all the water
Add pasta back to the pot, add half a cup of milk, add garlic powder, tsp dijon
Add two eggs to a small bowl, whisk
Put pot on low heat, add eggs and stir constantly for three minutes, then cut the heat
Add cheese and some pasta water if needed to make creamy
Add salt
fold in vegetables
mix
mix
Oil spray a small pan
Add pepperoni, fry a bit
add mozarella
whisk 2 eggs, pour into pan
Add tortilla to top and flip
Add all ingredients between two tortillas
spray with oil
air fry at 325F for 8 minutes

name: Ham and Noodle Casserole
notes: Good, but Ben wasn't a big fan

ingredients: Instant Pot if single serving, slow cooker if double
instructions: If using a slow cooker, add liner
cook on low for four hours

ingredients: 1 16oz can barbecue beans (or regular beans plus barbecue sauce)
1 11.5 oz can bean with bacon soup
1/2 tsp garlic salt (garlic powder is fine)
instructions: Line slow cooker
combine all ingredients except ground beef and cheese
Cover and cook on low for 4 hours
Add beef one hour before done, break it up
Top with cheese and serve with corn bread
fry onions in pan, add bay leaf
add ginger and garlic
add spices
add tomatoes
Optionally, stop and blend here
add chickpeas
cover and cook for 20 minutes
add tahini, mix well,
add kasuri methi, cilantro, lemon juice
Add oil spray to a small pan and add two eggs
Add seasoning to top, break the yolks and flip
Add cheese
Remove from pan and add to a tortilla
Add ketchup, roll, and fry seal closed

ingredients: kitchen bouquet or gravy master (basically for food coloring)
seasonings (optional, black pepper, garlic powder, etc)
instructions: In a cast iron skillet, fry down a lot of onions until golden
You can add a quarter tsp to the onions to help make them fry faster
Take onions out of pan, deglaze with two cups of broth
Transfer broth into something easier to pout (saucepan or large mug)
Add onions to blender
Add seasonings to blender
Add about 1 tsp kitchen bouquest
Add broth in little by little, until you get the desired thickness of the gravy

name: Healthier Stir Fry
notes: Lots of ideas in the video

instructions: Start the rice
microwave and drain the broccoli
mix water, soy sauce, corn starch, sugar, ginger and garlic to make a sauce
brown beef, move beef to the side and add broccoli to pan
Add sauce, let it simmer
Serve with rice

name: Baked Apple
notes: Great fall treat!  If made with brown stevia it's a tad healthier.

instructions: chop nuts if not pre-sliced
mix brown sugar, nutmeg, cinnamon, nuts in a bowl
Wash apples and carve out tops with a spoon, getting all the core but not drilling through
Add apples to a baking dish  (8x8 works)
fill apples with mixture
Add a splash (~ 1 tsp) vanilla to each apple
Add a pad of butter to each apple
Add 1.5 cups water to the bottom of dish
bake at 350F for 50 minutes
Optionally, halfway through baking, remove and baste apples with juice at bottom
Serve with vanilla ice cream

ingredients: light ranch dressing and/or greek yogurt for dipping
instructions: Add ranch seasoning to jar of pickles, let it sit for a day
Wrap pickles in bacon, air fry at 350F for 9 minutes

name: Meat and Potatoes sheet pan dinner

instructions: spray a sheet pan with olive oil
grate mozarella cheese, sprinkle 2/3 on pan, reserving some
peel and slice potatoes into 1/4 inch rounds, add to pan, salt, pepper and oil the top
bake for 30 minutes at 400F
start cooking beef in a skillet
finely dice the shallot, add to beef and mix
wash and slice mushrooms, add to skillet
add tomato puree, 1 squirt mustard, salt and pepper to skillet
mince garlice, add to skillet
Spread skillet contents on top of potatoes
Add leftover cheese to top
Bake at 400F for 15 minutes

versions.name: Tomato soup
instructions: quarter tomatoes and onion, peel garlic
Add garlic, onion, tomatoes, basil, salt and pepper to slow cooker with 2 cups of water
Cook on high for four hours, or 6 on low
Blend

versions.name: Grilled Cheese
instructions: Butter a large skilled, add unbuttered bread
Add bread, then cheese, then cheese again, then bread.  If using hamburger buns, turn them "inside out", so what's normally touching the inside of the hamburger, is the outside of your grilled cheese
Keep flipping and add more butter if it starts the burn
start macaroni
brown meat, season with salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder
If using fatty meat, drain excess oil
In a bowl, mix brown gravy mix and milk/water, add to skillet
Add sour cream to skillet
Add cream of mushroom soup to skillet
drain and add pasta, season and serve

ingredients: sauce for dipping (Crushed Tomatoes, ketchup, ranch, pizza sauce)
instructions: Sandwich pepperoni and cheese between two quesadillas.  You want to use more cheese that a normal pizza topping.  Optionally, add pizza seasoning
Fry on a skillet and cut into dunkable strips
cook hash browns in oil, add salt and pepper and seasoning, don't over-fry
mix 12 eggs in a bowl
oil a casserole dish, add potatoes, bacon and eggs in layers
Bake at 375F until eggs are firm

ingredients: 1 can green beans (not in crock pot)
instructions: dice onion
Add all to crock pot, 6 hours on low
serve with rice and green beans

name: Meal Prep Sweet and Sour Chicken
Burritos
notes: A winner!  I added more beans and more chicken, but it wasn't necessary..

versions.name: Meat
instructions: Can use any meat, but chicken breast is good.  sous vide it then dice it small
Dice peppers and jalapenos
mince cilantro, add lime juice and salt
mostly drain a can of beans, add beans, peppers and jalapenos to skillet
Add tomato sauce and spices, add lime juice and salt if needed
Add diced chicken and cheese
Put into burritos

ingredients: Chicken (Thighs or wings or drums or all)
Tomatoes, 1 can cruashed or whole ~15 oz
instructions: brown chicken in air fryer
Saute onions, then add ginger and garlic
Add tomatoes, sweet potatoes, chicken broth, peanut butter, peanuts and spices.  Stew for ~1 hour
Add chicken and let it finish, maybe 30 minutes
Put out chicken and de-bone / shred
immersion blender on rest of stew, add lots of salt and pepper
Add cilentra and chicken, let cook for 10 more minutes and serve

ingredients: 1/2 bag ranch dressing mix (or whole bag)
instructions: Add all to slow cooker, in order
If using breasts, cook for five hours then removed breasts to shred.  Don't re-add until end to prevent drying
slow cook the rest for 8 hours
Service with cheddar cheese and corn bread

versions.name: One pizza
instructions: Add sugar and warm water and yeast to cup
Blend almond flour, wheat gluten, lupin flour, salt and gelatin
Add dry ingredients, warm water and olive oil to stand mixer and mix
Let dough rise for an hour on counter

ingredients: 1 pound ground beef (85% or leaner preferred)
instructions: Preheat oven to 425F
In large pot add ground beef
remove casing from sausages and add meat
add diced onion, let all cook
add spices, tomato paste, better than boullon, let cook
Add crushed tomatoes and water, add dried spaghetti and mix
cover pot and put in oven for 15 minutes
peel and chunk potatoes, boil for a bit to soften
onions in a skillet, then red pepper, then potatoes, then chicken

name: Healthier Cheesecake
notes: This recipe rocks!

ingredients: 2 cups non fat light vanilla greek yogurt (Add vanilla if plain)
instructions: Mix, put into pie crust
Bake at 325F for 65 minutes
Remove and let it cool
Place in fridge

ingredients: 4 parts greek yogurt, by weight, to 1 part rice vinegar
Flavoring, lime juice, lemeon juice, herbs, PB powder
instructions: Don't make too much, better when fresh
Make fries in air fryer
Cook up beef and onions, add red pepper at end
In a blender, add cheeses and spices,blend until smooth
Add beef then cheese mixture to fries

ingredients: 4 cups broth (or water + better than bouillon
instructions: soak beans the night before in water with 1 tsp baking soda
heat oil in instant pot, add minced garlic then add drained beans and everything else
Cook on high pressure for 45 minutes.  Takes about 1 hour
Take out two cups of beans and blend them with an immersion blender
Slice Pepperoni into shreds
Shred mozzarella into a bowl
Add basil and oregano to bowl
Make cones with tortillas, add pepperoni/cheese mixture, seal shut
spray with oil and cook in the air fryer at 375 for 10 minutes
Serve with pizza sauce for dipping
Mix, add to everything
